channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - Once More Into the Void
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-once-more-into-the-void
Rach and Rich continue their third Summer Series. This series covers games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This seventh episode of the series features Rae Nadjadi, creator of *​Once More into the Void* .
Timecodes: 00:01:30- Setting Up 00:07:53 - The Challenge 00:18:46 - Playing the Games
Find Once More into the Void here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/Jagash/once-more-into-the-void
